Row.Text: Tier 1 Modern Ranged Unit. Stronger on attack than defense.
Tier 1 Modern Cavalry Unit. Ignores Zone of Control.
Tier 1 Modern Siege Unit. High Bombard strength for attacking Fortified Districts.
Tier 1 Modern Light Naval Unit. Has the Skirmish ability, +50% Combat Strength from Flanking.
Tier 1 Modern Heavy Naval Unit. Cannot enter Navigable Rivers.
Tier 2 Modern Ranged Unit. Stronger on attack than defense.
Tier 2 Modern Cavalry Unit. Ignores Zone of Control.
Tier 2 Modern Siege Unit. High Bombard strength for attacking Fortified Districts.
Tier 2 Modern Light Naval Unit. Has the Skirmish ability, +50% Combat Strength from Flanking.
Tier 2 Modern Heavy Naval Unit. Cannot enter Navigable Rivers.
Tier 2 Modern Fighter Air Unit. Can intercept enemy Air Units. Not very effective against Land or Naval Units.
Tier 2 Modern Ground Attack Air Unit. Strong against Land and Naval Units. Not very effective against Aircraft.
Tier 2 Modern Siege Air Unit. High Bombard strength for attacking Fortified Districts at long range.
Tier 3 Modern Ranged Unit. Stronger on attack than defense.
Tier 3 Modern Cavalry Unit. Ignores Zone of Control.
Tier 3 Modern Siege Unit. High Bombard strength for attacking Fortified Districts.
Tier 3 Modern Light Naval Unit. Has the Skirmish ability, +50% Combat Strength from Flanking.
Tier 3 Modern Heavy Naval Unit. Cannot enter Navigable Rivers.
Tier 3 Modern Stealth Naval Unit. Can only be seen by adjacent Units.
Tier 3 Modern Fighter Air Unit. Can intercept enemy Air Units. Not very effective against Land or Naval Units.
Tier 3 Modern Ground Attack Air Unit. Strong against Land and Naval Units. Not very effective against Aircraft.
Tier 3 Modern Siege Air Unit. High Bombard strength for attacking Fortified Districts at long range.
Support Unit that finds and extracts Artifacts buried in an earlier Age.
American Unique Infantry Unit. Has the Amphibious ability. Cheaper to train.
Tier 2 American Unique Infantry Unit. Has the Amphibious ability. Cheaper to train.
Tier 3 American Unique Infantry Unit. Has the Amphibious ability. Cheaper to train.
American Unique Civilian Unit. Claims a Land Resource outside of your regular Settlement radius.
Activate on an unowned Resource tile within 5 tiles of one of your Settlements' Palace or City Hall. A path of tiles is claimed back to the Settlement and the Resource is improved immediately.
Bugandan Unique Infantry Unit. Heals +10 HP from pillaging any tile.
Tier 1 Bugandan Unique Infantry Unit. Heals +10 HP from pillaging any tile.
Tier 2 Bugandan Unique Infantry Unit. Heals +10 HP from pillaging any tile.
Tier 3 Bugandan Unique Infantry Unit. Heals +10 HP from pillaging any tile.
Bugandan Unique Army Commander. +50% yield from pillaging within the Command Radius.
Pillaging gives[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to the yield or healing.
French Imperial Unique Infantry Unit. Can make a Ranged attack. +2 Combat Strength when adjacent to a friendly Army Commander. More expensive to train.
Tier 1 French Imperial Unique Infantry Unit. Can make a Ranged attack. +2 Combat Strength when adjacent to a friendly Army Commander. More expensive to train.
Tier 2 French Imperial Unique Infantry Unit. Can make a Ranged attack. +2 Combat Strength when adjacent to a friendly Army Commander. More expensive to train.
Tier 3 French Imperial Unique Infantry Unit. Can make a Ranged attack. +2 Combat Strength when adjacent to a friendly Army Commander. More expensive to train.
Meiji Japanese Unique Heavy Naval Unit. The first time this Unit is destroyed, it respawns in the closest Settlement you own at 50% HP.
Tier 2 Meiji Japanese Unique Heavy Naval Unit. The first time this Unit is destroyed, it respawns in the closest Settlement you own at 50% HP.
Tier 3 Meiji Japanese Unique Heavy Naval Unit. The first time this Unit is destroyed, it respawns in the closest Settlement you own at 50% HP.
Meiji Japanese Unique Fighter Air Unit. Increased range. +4 Combat Strength against other Fighter Air Units. Can intercept enemy Air Units.
Tier 2 Meiji Japanese Unique Fighter Air Unit. Increased range. +4 Combat Strength against other Fighter Air Units. Can intercept enemy Air Units.
Tier 3 Meiji Japanese Unique Fighter Air Unit. Increased range. +4 Combat Strength against other Fighter Air Units. Can intercept enemy Air Units.
Mexican Unique Infantry Unit. Adjacent Units heal +10 HP. Does not stack.

Tier 2 Mexican Unique Infantry Unit. Adjacent Units heal +10 HP. Does not stack.
Tier 3 Mexican Unique Infantry Unit. Adjacent Units heal +10 HP. Does not stack.

Tier 3 Mughal Unique Infantry Unit. Can make a Bombard Ranged attack.
Ranged attack with +20 Combat Strength against Fortified Districts.
Mughal Unique Settler. Civilian Unit capable of founding new Towns. +1 Population on new Settlements.
Prussian Unique Additional Cavalry Unit. Has +1 Movement. +1 Combat Strength for every Movement it has remaining.

Tier 3 Prussian Unique Additional Cavalry Unit. Has +1 Movement. +1 Combat Strength for every Movement it has remaining.
Prussian Ground Attack Air Unit. +3 Combat Strength against Land Units.
Tier 2 Prussian Ground Attack Air Unit. +3 Combat Strength against Land Units.
Tier 3 Prussian Ground Attack Air Unit. +3 Combat Strength against Land Units.
+3 Combat Strength for Units within the Command Radius of a Commander that has earned at least 1 Commendation.
Qing Unique Infantry Unit. +4 Combat Strength if adjacent to another Gusa.

Tier 2 Qing Unique Infantry Unit. +4 Combat Strength if adjacent to another Gusa.
Tier 3 Qing Unique Infantry Unit. +4 Combat Strength if adjacent to another Gusa.

Qing Unique Merchant. Civilian who can establish a Trade Route to import Resources from a foreign Settlement. Gain 50[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every Resource acquired when creating a naval Trade Route.
Russian Unique Additional Cavalry Unit. +4 Combat Strength in friendly territory.

Tier 3 Russian Unique Additional Cavalry Unit. +4 Combat Strength in friendly territory.
Russian Unique Siege Unit. Has +1 Movement. Lower base Combat Strength but has the Splash ability, dealing damage to enemy Units adjacent to the target Unit.

City State Unique Infantry Unit. Each one is slightly more expensive than the last. +5 Combat Strength against Civilizations with a different Ideology. +10 healing in owned territory.
